title: FINAL FANTASY VIII
notes:
To fix the music, first install directmusic using winetricks (WINEPREFIX="<Steam library path>/steamapps/compatdata/39150/pfx"), and then set dsound to builtin. For the music mods to work, you also need to set ddraw to native. Mods that depend on Tonberry also work if d3d9 is set to native, but this have a huge impact on the game performance outside of battles.
The launcher gets stuck after closing the game, so you have to kill it.
I used the method mentioned in another post to fix the background music. Everything else works perfectly.
